data.title: Gauhati University
data.meta_description: Complete information on Gauhati University, Assam . Find out about courses offered by Gauhati University, Assam  and list of all affiliated colleges under Gauhati University, Assam
data.text:
Overview

Guwahati University was established in 1948 by an act of the state legislature of Assam. It is situated to the west of the city of Guwahati and has more than 240 affiliated colleges. Guwahati University is a public state university that provides education in the state of Assam. It offers courses in arts, sciences, technology, commerce, management and law.
